data.description: Major trends and developments in the sciences from the 17th century to the early 20th century. Emphasis on those with broad cultural and social implications.
data.title: THE MAKING OF MODERN SCIENCE

data.description: Western science and technology in the making. Major developments viewed in philosophical and social context from the 17th to early twentieth century.
data.title: WESTERN CULTURE: SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY, PHILOSOPHY II
